subject: Wrestling
lead_paragraph: Much like the N.C.A.A. tournament is advertised as the road to the national championship, W.W.E. has billed the last few weeks as the Road to WrestleMania.
snippet: Much like the N.C.A.A. tournament is advertised as the road to the national championship, W.W.E. has billed the last few weeks as the Road to WrestleMania.
